K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350a-1: a'arya ratna ts'u da pa ri pri tstsh'a n'a ma mah'a y'a na su tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350a-3: 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350a-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-0: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong bzhi khri nyis @350b stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-1: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-2: nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-3: sems shin tu rnam par grol pa; shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-9: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-10: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-11: yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-12: sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-13: byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-14: thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-16: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di las byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-17: padma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-18: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-19: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-20: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa; yon tan 'byung gnas bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gtan la phebs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-22: byang chub kyi snying por rab tu gzhol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-23: bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-24: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:350b-25: mi zad pa'i bstan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-0: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs @351a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-2: mi 'jig pa seng ge'i stabs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-3: tshig bstan pa la phyed pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du lung ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-4: gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-5: 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-6: grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mthon po phyogs bcur grags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te rab tu bkur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-14: thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-15: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par shin tu spyad pa byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-16: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes nas so so ci rigs par chos kyi sman gtong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-17: rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-18: rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pas dge ba dag cing dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-19: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-20: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-23: rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-24: rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351a-25: sems dpa' zhing brtan la rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-2: shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-5: smon lam la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-7: ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-9: rtag tu rnam par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-14: seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-15: seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-18: rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-21: mi g-yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-22: 'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-26: rin po che bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-31: lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-32: yon tan gyi rgyal po snang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-33: bkod pa'i rgyal po snang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-35: yid gnyis rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-36: glog gi snang bas brgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-42: rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:351b-43: bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-1: la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-2: spos kyi glang po che la sogs pa dag pa'i sems can sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-3: byams pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-4: lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-5: lha'i bu dge ba bkod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-10: rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-11: lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-12: de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-13: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-14: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-15: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-17: lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-27: mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dang yang thabs gcig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-29: 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-31: nyi ma ltar ni lhan ne /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-32: zla ba ltar ni lham me /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-34: brgya byin ltar ni lhang nge /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352a-35: tshangs pa ltar ni lhag ge /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-0: rgya mtsho chen @352b po'i dbus na ri rab ltar ni 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-1: 'khor chen po'i dbus su gshegs pas chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo las brtsams nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-13: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod par 'gyur bar yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-14: yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de na; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug tu na rin po che zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-16: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:352b-24: mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-1: legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-3: de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-4: rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-5: me tog kha dog du ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-6: kha dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-7: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-8: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-9: gang gis sdug bsngal mtha' yas bzod byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-10: brtul zhugs brten pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-11: drang srong chen po sh'aka [*sh'akya?] thub sus mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-12: lha mi rnams kyi rnyed pa legs par rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-13: gangg'a'i bye snyed byang chub sems dpa' mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-14: brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-15: stong phrag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab btul bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-16: byang chub rdul bral mya ngan med pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-17: 'gro ba kun gyi gtso bor bsnyen bkur bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-18: shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-19: legs par sprul nas spyod pa yongs dag pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-20: rgyal ba'i thad nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-21: su dag chos kyi gtam rnams nyan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-22: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-23: rkang gnyis gtso bo de yang blta 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353a-24: de dag bya rgod phung por myur du shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-0: 'dren pa mthong @353b ba shin tu rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-1: zhi ba'i chos kyang thos par shin tu dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-2: dal 'byor mir skye shin tu rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-3: tshul khrims dad pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-4: 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-5: bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-6: mya ngan 'das nas de ni ci bya yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-7: da ni rgyal pa'i drung der 'dong par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-8: gang dag ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni; ;lha mi'i nang du bde ba 'thob pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-9: mya ngan 'das thob bde bar 'gyur 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-10: mtshungs med de yi gan du de dag deng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-11: de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-12: de ni ded dpon mchog gi lam mtshon pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-13: de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-14: de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag smras pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs kyis go bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-18: thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-20: 'di lta bu'i don dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:353b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-0: shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs @354a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-1: par sprul pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang bcas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-7: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-15: mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-17: me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-19: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g-yo bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354a-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che des sems can bag med pa rnams yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-0: @354b tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-2: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-3: sems can dpag tu med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-12: mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-14: me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g-yo bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-19: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-21: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:354b-31: mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-0: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub @355a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-1: sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-3: bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-7: stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-9: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa nyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang la gnas na shin tu mthar phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-14: shin tu yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-15: de dag la bag chags kyi sa mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kun du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:355a-16: rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-13: sems can gyi rjes su song ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-14: chos kyi rjes su song ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-15: de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-16: skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-17: de'i shes rab de gnas pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-18: yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-19: de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-20: dbus la yang mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-21: de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-22: 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-23: de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-24: de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-25: mi ldan pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370a-26: bral ba yang ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-0: @370b chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-2: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-3: bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no; ;thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-4: yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-6: gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-7: so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-8: yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi'i srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-12: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-13: dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-14: lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-15: de dag gi tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:370b-17: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-0: @371a *// gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-5: de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-7: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-9: de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-11: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta bas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-12: lus la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-13: rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-15: mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-16: sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-17: de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-19: kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-20: btsog pas yongs su gang ba yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-21: de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371a-23: gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-1: 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-2: gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-4: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-6: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa na chos gnyis yongs su sbyong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-9: mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-11: de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-13: kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-15: tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-16: lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-17: de snying po gsum yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-20: longs spyod kyi snying po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-21: 'tsho ba'i snying po dang gsum mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-22: de lus mi rtag go snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-23: ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-24: lus mi rtag go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-26: tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do; ;lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-27: srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:371b-28: lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-1: thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-3: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-4: de las yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-5: de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-6: gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-7: chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-8: dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-9: sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-10: sems can thams cad la btang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-11: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-12: gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-13: 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-19: smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-20: de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372a-21: mtshan ma med pas nges par brtags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-0: smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson 'grus @372b brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-1: nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-2: de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-4: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-5: bdag gi lus de sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-6: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-7: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-8: de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-9: de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-10: zag pa rnams gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-14: ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-16: de la 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-17: srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:372b-18: ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-0: lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas 'don @373a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-1: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-2: lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma byung bar so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-3: lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-4: lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-5: de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas las dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-6: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-7: bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-8: yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-9: rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do; ;gnod sems med pas bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-10: bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-13: 'dud par yang mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-14: chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-15: chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373a-16: chos kyi 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-0: chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan @373b pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-1: chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-2: yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-3: mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-4: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-5: rnam par rtog par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-6: rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro; ;mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-9: rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin thob nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-14: de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-17: tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-18: de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:373b-19: de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spong ba'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-0: de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba @374a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-1: 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba yang 'gog par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-2: des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-3: de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-4: bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-5: nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-6: bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-7: nam bde ba yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-8: sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de ni gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-9: bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-10: de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-11: rjes su chags pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-12: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-13: khong khro ba legs par 'joms par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-15: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-16: ma rig pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-17: des tshor ba gang ci myong yang de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374a-18: sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-0: de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi @374b rtag par shes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-1: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-3: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro; ;de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-4: gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-5: gang bde ba yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-6: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-11: gnas pa med par shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-12: chos thams cad la skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-13: 'jig par yang so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-14: so sor rtog pa na chos skye ba de dag gang nas 'ongs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-15: 'gag pa rnams gang du gsog par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-16: des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-17: gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par bsgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-18: bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-20: sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-21: bdag 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:374b-23: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-0: gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu @375a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-2: tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-3: tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams dben pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-4: rnam par dben par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-5: 'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-6: 'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-7: chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-8: bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-9: byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-10: rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-14: des yang dag par rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-15: des ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-16: ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375a-20: ye shes rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-0: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag @375b pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-2: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-3: sems dran pa ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-4: de sems kun du tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-5: sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-6: sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-7: phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-8: khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-9: skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-10: des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-11: dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-12: de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-13: ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-15: 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-16: gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-17: sems kyang gzhan yin na ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-18: 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-19: sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:375b-20: sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-3: ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-4: sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-5: de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba la gang sems mi gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-6: chad pa ma yin pa; rtag pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-7: ther zug tu mi gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-8: rgyu med pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-11: gzhan las kyang ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-13: gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-17: sems rgyu ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-18: sems snang ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-19: sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid du 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-21: de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid du rab tu shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-22: de bzhin du mthong ba de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376a-26: gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-0: spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran @376b pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-2: gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-3: ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-4: byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-5: ji ltar byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de yang gzugs med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-6: de'i phyir sems ji lta bar spyod pa yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-7: spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-8: byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-9: sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-10: byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-11: gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-15: mi gnas par rgyu ba; spre'u dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-18: 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-22: skye mched drug la spyod yul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-23: gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-27: zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:376b-28: g-yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-1: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-2: sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-3: sems la chos kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-4: sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-5: sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-6: sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-7: sems la mngon sum gyi shes pas rab tu shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-8: sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-9: sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-10: sems la de kho nar shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-11: sems la g-yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-12: de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-13: sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-14: rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-15: sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-16: rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377a-17: sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-0: ji ltar @377b rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-1: sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-2: de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-3: sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-4: de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-5: sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-6: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-7: sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-8: sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas par rjes su shes kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-9: sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g-yo ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-11: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-13: de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:377b-15: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-2: chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-16: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-17: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-19: gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-23: ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-24: chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-25: chos rnams rgyu ba med par yang gang gis kyang mi skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-26: 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-28: bsod nams ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-29: mi g-yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-30: de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-31: 'di ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-35: khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-36: bcu po de dag gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-38: lus yongs su dag pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378a-39: spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-0: pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pa thams cad las @378b shin tu 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-1: ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-2: rnam pa drug cu shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-3: sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-4: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-5: so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-8: spobs pa mi zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-9: byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu 'god pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-10: snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-11: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-12: mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-13: mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas bar du gcod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-14: bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-18: dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:378b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-0: bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur @379a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-2: des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-3: bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog pa la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-4: de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du bag chags su yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-5: de mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas mi g-yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-6: ting nge 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-7: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-8: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-9: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-11: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-12: chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag sgom la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-13: byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar mi ltung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-14: mi dge ba'i chos spong yang chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379a-15: gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-2: gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-3: ma rig pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-4: 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-5: de bzhin du ma rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-9: rnam par shes pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-11: ming dang gzugs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-13: skye mched drug med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-32: 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-33: gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-34: 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-35: chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-36: de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-37: dbu ma'i lam la ni btags pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:379b-38: gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-6: gang du phog pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-8: phog pa de ni dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-9: blta ba'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-11: dmigs pa gang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-12: gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-13: gang de gnyis kyis dbu mar bstan par mi nus pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-15: brda tsam du dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-16: don dam par ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-17: don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-18: de la ni nyung ngu yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-20: gang la nyung ngu yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-21: mang po yang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-24: bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-26: bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-28: gang zag ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-30: gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-32: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-33: mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380a-35: mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-1: 'jig pa med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-3: bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-4: brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-6: pha rol ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-7: 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-9: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-10: spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-11: 'khor ba dang; mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-12: rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-14: de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-15: de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-16: chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-17: de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med par khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-18: chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-19: sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-20: des chos thams cad dbyings gcig tu shes nas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:380b-21: de nam mi mthong ba de na chos rnams la tha dad du mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-0: @381a *// des chos rnams la mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-1: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-2: shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-4: de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-5: de'i phyir de sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-6: de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par ltung ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-7: de'i phyir de lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-8: de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-9: de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-10: chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-11: de chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-14: gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de yang mi 'dor ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381a-18: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-0: lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing @381b gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-1: tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-2: sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-3: chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-4: de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid bsgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-5: yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-7: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-8: yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'jug gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-10: mi dge ba la ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-11: de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-12: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:381b-13: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-0: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyams par mi @382a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-3: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las yongs su dag pa'i phyir rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-6: 'bad ba med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-7: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di dag sems kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-10: brtson 'grus kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-13: kha na mtho [*ma tho?] ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-15: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-16: yang dag pa la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-18: de'i spong ba mnyam pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-19: mi mnyam pa ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-20: de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-21: mi mnyam pa ma yin no; ;yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-22: mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par bsgrub pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382a-23: de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-0: de @382b ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-3: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-4: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-5: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-6: dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-7: de byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-8: mi dge ba'i chos spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-9: snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-10: thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pas spyod pa yang par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-15: tshe la dbang ba thob bo; ;tshe la dbang ba des 'dod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-16: sems can tshe thung ngu rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongs su 'dzin cing sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:382b-17: sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na; yongs su skyo ba rnams la chos bstan pas yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-0: lha'am mi gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang bsgyur @383a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-3: byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la dbang thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-6: lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas lus ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-11: spyod lam ci 'dra bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-12: 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-17: spyod lam kun du ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-18: de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-23: spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-25: byang chub sems dpas dbang gnyis pa 'di thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-27: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos la dbang thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-28: chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-29: 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-30: de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton kyang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-31: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de las kyang mi g-yo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383a-33: ye shes chags pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-0: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid @383b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-1: chos rnam par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-2: gang gis sems can tshad med pa rnams bsam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-3: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-5: byang chub sems dpas dbang gsum pa 'di 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-7: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-8: byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang 'dres pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-9: spyod pa de yang kun du ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-10: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-12: spyod pa de yang kun du ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa gzhi'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:383b-20: rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang de 'dra bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-0: de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs thams @384a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-1: cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de ltar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-2: de'i sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyis brlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun du gnas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-4: byang chub sems dpas dbang bzhi pa 'di 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-6: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-7: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-8: de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-10: 'jig rten skyong pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-19: mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-21: byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-22: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-24: lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-25: sbyin gnas rnams la ldang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-29: thal mo sbyor cing mthun par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-30: ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384a-31: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-0: sems yang bar bya @384b ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-2: bla ma la rim gro byed cing gus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-5: sems las su rung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-6: sems la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-7: spong ba rnams la brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-8: bden pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-9: mi lhod par brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-10: dgos pa grub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-11: snyoms las mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-13: 'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-14: zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-15: gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-18: ser sna dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-20: lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-21: gzhan gyi dgos pa bsgrub cing khur khyer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-22: nyam chung ba rnams kyi khur sgrol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-24: klung la zam pas sgrol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-25: chu bo la gru sbyor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-26: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-27: dga' ba'i tshig thos par byed pa dang; gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-28: nyes pa byung ba rnams gso bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-30: kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-31: khams gang gis 'byung ba khong du chud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-32: phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-33: byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:384b-34: sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-0: @385a *// dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-1: gzhan dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag bar 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-2: bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-3: bde ba gzhan la stob pa dang; bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-4: gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-5: rab tu byung ba la gzhol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-6: gzhan dag kyang rab tu byang ba la mos par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-11: mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-15: dpung bu chung sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-16: ngal ba rnams yang dag par spro bar byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-19: ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-20: dbul po rnams la longs spyod 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-21: nad pa rnams kyi g-yog byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385a-31: byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:385b-20: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par yongs su bsngos pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:386b-2: gzhan yang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i dbang po'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:386b-3: dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:386b-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni 'dor ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:389b-13: 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:389b-15: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:389b-16: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-1: dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-3: gzhan yang byang chub kyi bsam pa ma brjed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-4: gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-5: gang sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yongs su mi skyo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-6: gang dam pa'i chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas gnas pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-7: gang shin tu sbyangs pa la sems can rnams 'god pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-8: gang ting nge 'dzin la sems can rnams 'god pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-9: gang mngon sum du shes pa btang snyoms la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-11: gzhan yang gang nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390a-13: gang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-0: yid kyi las brtul ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa @390b yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-1: gang rjes su chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-2: khong khro ba spong ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-3: gang bya ba byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-4: byed pa byas pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-5: gang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug kyang gcig tu snyoms par zhugs par yang 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-6: gang gnyis su med pa'i chos la rab tu gnas te rtog pa dang sel ba med cing btang snyoms par kun tu snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-7: sems can la yang lta ba 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-9: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-10: rjes su rtog par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-11: rab tu 'byed par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-13: nye bar rtog pa khong du chud cing sems can gyi spyod pa mtho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-14: dma' ba thams cad rtogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-15: de la gnas nas kyang ngan song du 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-16: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bag la nyal ba dang kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-19: 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:390b-20: 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-1: spyod yul gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-2: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni nga rgyal can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-3: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-4: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-5: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-10: chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-11: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-12: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-14: rnam par shes pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-15: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-18: rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-19: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tha na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa rnams kyi spyod yul yang ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-20: chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391a-21: chos thams cad la rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-0: yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul @391b lo; ;chos thams cad kun nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-1: chos thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-2: chos thams cad rtsod pa med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-3: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-5: de ltar gang 'phags pa'i spyod yul yongs su dag pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-7: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-9: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-10: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-12: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-14: yang dag pa'i rtsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-15: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-16: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-17: yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes smos pa de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-18: gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-19: de bdag tu lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-20: sems can du lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-22: gang zag tu lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-23: stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-24: de ci'i phyir zhe na; bdag tu lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-25: sems can du lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-27: gang zag tu lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-28: stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:391b-29: de chad par lta ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-5: stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-8: stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-12: stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so; ;de 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-14: nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-15: stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-19: nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-20: stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-21: de sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-24: stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-26: sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-29: stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-30: rigs kyi bu; de ltar na lta ba'i dmigs pa ni ji tsam du chung na mya ngan las 'das pa la lta ba'i dmigs pa yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-31: de tsam du yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-34: 'bring gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392a-37: mi mnyam par ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-0: ji ltar na mnyam @392b par lta'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-1: mi mnyam par ma yin no zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-2: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni dman pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-3: slob pa'i chos rnams ni dam pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-4: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-5: mi slob pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar na mi mnyam par lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-6: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zang zing dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zang zing med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-8: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-10: so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams ni 'dus byas yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-12: nam so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad slob pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-13: de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-14: so so'i skye bo'i chos stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-15: mi slob pa'i chos stong pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-16: de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-17: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa mtshungs par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-19: de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:392b-20: so so'i skye bo'i chos dben pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-1: chub sems dpa'i chos dben pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-2: de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-3: so so'i skye bo'i chos yongs su grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-5: de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-6: gang mtshungs par mthong ba de'i phyir yang gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-7: gang gnyis su med par mthong ba de yang dag pa mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-8: gang mtshungs par mthong ba de yang tha dad du mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-9: tha dad med pa mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o; ;gang mtshungs par mthong ba de tha ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-11: rab kyi chos la rnam par rtog pa mi skyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-12: chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-13: gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni mthong ba ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-14: mthong ba ci yang med pa ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-15: gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-16: chos thams cad snang ba med par mthong ba de ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-18: gang chos 'di dag de ltar mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-19: ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393a-20: mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-0: yang dag pa'i lta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni @393b len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-1: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po zhig ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid la bzod pa skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-3: de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-4: rtog pa gang rtag pa spong par 'gyur ba'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-8: de chos gang zhig chos gang dang ldan snyam du chos de dag la rnam par lta'o //
