K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-11: rab tu ldan pa ma yin pa dang; ma 'dres par rab tu shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-12: des de ltar shes nas mnyam par yang mi rtog na gang mi mnyam par rtog par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-13: de ni gnas ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-14: de chos su rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-16: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-18: rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-20: de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-21: tshig gang gis bdag la yang mi gdung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-22: gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-23: bdag kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-24: gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-25: bdag la yang mi gnod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-26: gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:393b-27: 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-0: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni tshig gis chos thams cad mnyam ba @394a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-1: nyid du nges par rtog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-2: de'i chos nges par rtog pa de yang chos nges pa'i tshig des 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-3: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni gang mdza' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-4: mi mdza' ba rnams la ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-5: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-6: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-8: mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-10: ma byung ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-11: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-12: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-13: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-14: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-15: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-19: bdag dang bral ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-20: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-21: rgyu ci 'dra ba 'bras bu yang de 'dra ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-22: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya ba ni gang sems can gzhan rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-23: gang zag gzhan dag yang dag pa'i chos la 'dzud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:394a-24: byang chub kyang yang dag par rab tu 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:398b-4: gzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis brtags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:398b-15: dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos pa na grong khyer chen po zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:398b-16: grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-2: zas dang skom dang bza' ba yang med pa zhig la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-3: gang grong khyer chen po der phyin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba zhig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-4: de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis grong khyer chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa thos nas skyes bu de la bu mthong na dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-7: mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i bu gcig kyang yod pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-8: des bu gcig pa de bor nas grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-10: brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyad du bsad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-11: lam ring po de 'das nas rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer chen po de'i sgo'i them pa la bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-12: rkang pa ya gcig ni phyi rol na 'dug pa las des bu gcig po de yid la dran par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-14: bdag gis bu gcig pa de 'dir khrid de ma 'ongs pa lta zhig snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-15: bu gcig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-16: phyir phyogs nas bu gcig pa de ga la 'dug par slar log pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-17: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399a-18: brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-0: lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes @399b pa lnga po rnams bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-1: sems kyis bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-2: de snying rje chen po'i sems skyes nas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las sems can rnams la lta bas phyir phyogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-3: slar log nas so so'i skye bo'i sa na yang kun du snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-5: grong khyer zhes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-6: dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-7: bar du gcod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdud kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa'i bar chad kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-8: skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-9: rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-10: rkang pa ya gcig sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag ces bya ba de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus byas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-11: 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:399b-12: bu gcig pa dran nas grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa las phyir phyogs te slar log ces bya ba de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-1: spyi bor phyin kyang zag pa yang mi spong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-2: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-3: phyir phyogs shing ldog par yang 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-4: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'i thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag mthil du thob pa yang mi 'tshal bar 'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-8: sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni ngo mtshar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du zhig dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyi shu dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-14: chos nyi shu gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-16: dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-17: byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400a-18: snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-0: sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yang @400b dag par zin pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-1: brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-2: lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-3: thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-4: shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-5: bsam gtan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-6: mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-7: ye shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i brtul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-8: brtul bas yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-9: dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-10: byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-11: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par zin pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-12: tshul khrims kyi sdom pas yang dag par zin pa'i nan tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-13: thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzungs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-14: gzungs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-15: spobs pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-16: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:400b-17: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @401a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-1: po gtsug na rin po ches yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-3: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-6: bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so; ;thos pas brgyan pa'i spobs pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-8: gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-9: lag na rin po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod kyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-10: skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-13: chos ston pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-16: ye shes kyis brgyan pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-18: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401a-19: de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-0: gzhan yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong @401b bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-1: so so ci rigs par chos ston pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-3: gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-4: thos pa yongs su dag pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-6: ji ltar bag yod pas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas kyang ches grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-11: bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-12: bskal pa dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya bar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-14: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-16: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-19: ci'i phyir bskal pa de dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:401b-21: bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-1: gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bu lha dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-2: kye ma'o grogs po dag 'di ni bskal pa bzang po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-3: bskal pa 'di la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba'i sgra bsgrags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-4: de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-5: thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-7: mos pa chen po skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-8: de nas lha dang mi de dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-9: kye ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad ces smras pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur pa zhes btags so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams de lha thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang de ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de tsam du lta na sdug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-11: de tsam du nyams dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa de'i gzhi ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-14: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de phye ma khal gcig gi rin du yang mi bzod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams de nas spos kyi ngad langs pa'i dris ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag tu khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-0: tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las gyur pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i padmo chen po sha stag @402b 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-1: padmo de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-2: mi de dag kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa pu shu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-5: rta babs kyis legs par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams de na grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-8: grong rdal gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-9: mi de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-10: de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag gi nang du 'jug cing nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams de na mngal na gnas pa yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-12: mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skyes pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-13: de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-14: ngan song rnams kyang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-18: mi de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-19: bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-20: mos pa rlabs po ches theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-21: de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-22: gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan thogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:402b-24: rna chas ba rgyan pa lha'i kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-0: gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de @403a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-1: dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos ngur smrig tu bka' stsal pa yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-3: 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-5: rigs kyi bu; gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa der lhags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-10: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-13: ta la brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-14: tshangs pa bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du mang du spros te rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam mi ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa de tshig dang yi ge nyung ngus chos kyi gtam mdor ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-0: skyes bu dam pa de dag ni zur tsam gyis go ba sha stag @403b ste; tshig gcig gis tshig brgya stong gi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-3: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-4: mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-5: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-6: spyod pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' las brtsams te yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mdas 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-8: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes gsol to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig de gnyis rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-11: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-12: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:403b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bstan pa de lta bu bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos rnams la mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-0: @404a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mda' des yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-2: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por mdzes par 'gyid pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mda' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-6: byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-7: de la bag yod pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-8: ji tsam du chos rnams bsgrub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-9: chos rnams bsgrub pa yang gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-11: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-13: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-15: sbyor ba tshad med pa mthar gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-16: sems can tshad med pa sdud pas sbyin pa mi zad pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-17: mi lhod cing sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-18: sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404a-19: skyes bu dam pa'i las kyis brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-0: ting nge @404b 'dzin tshad med pa bsgrubs pas bsam gtan tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-1: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi phyir shes rab tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-2: sems can tshad med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-3: phan pa'i dngos pos snying rje tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-5: bdag bde ba la mi chags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-6: brtson 'grus brtan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-7: yang dag par sbyor bas yon tan yang dag par bsgrub cing gsog pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-8: ye shes tshad med pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-9: shes rab sbyong bas thos pa yongs su tshol ba tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-10: sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-11: byams pa nges pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-12: sems 'dul bas dgon pa na gnas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-13: myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs tshad med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-15: chos 'di dag ni bag yod pa bsgrub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:404b-19: bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-1: yod pa ni ye shes bsgrub pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-2: bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos bsags shing bsags pa rnams so so yang dag par 'dzin pa'o; ;bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i chos rnams chud mi gson pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-3: bag yod pa ni bsdu bar bya ba'i chos rnams sdud pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-4: bag yod pa ni sgrib pa'i chos rnams mi sdud pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-5: bag yod pa ni sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-6: bag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-7: bag yod pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'bar bar byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-8: bag yod pa ni dbang po rnams sdom par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-9: bag yod pa ni lam nyam nga ba las kun du bsrung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-10: bag yod pa ni dus dang dus ma yin par spyod pa las bskul ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-11: bag yod pa ni stobs te stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-12: bag yod pa ni zil gyis mi gnon pa ste mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-13: bag yod pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-15: bag yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba @405b des 'di lta bu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-1: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mdar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na yang de ltar mi lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-5: rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-6: rigs kyi bu khyod rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyang bag yod pas thob par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-9: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-11: sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yang tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:405b-13: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-1: khrims kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-2: la la ni tshul khrims spangs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-3: sems can la la ni tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-5: la la ni tshig rtsub pos /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-10: la la ni ma bslangs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-12: la la ni mi gnod pas /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-14: la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-16: la la ni ma sbyangs pas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-18: la la ni sbyin pa'i phyir byin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-20: sems can la la ni gzugs yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-21: sems can la la ni sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-25: chos yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-26: sems can la la ni gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-27: sems can la la ni sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-31: chos yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-32: sems can la la ni spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-33: sems can la la ni rtag tu mthong bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406a-34: la la ni ma mthong bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-0: sems @406b can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-1: sems can la la ni chos kyi sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-2: sems can la la ni dge 'dun gyi sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-3: la la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-4: la la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-5: la la ni bdag med pa'i sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-6: la la ni zhi ba'i sgras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-7: sems can la la ni sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-12: shes rab kyi sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:406b-13: sems can la la ni sems can dmyal ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-7: la la ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-8: sems can la la ni chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-9: sems can la la ni lag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-11: mig dang mgo bo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-12: sems can la la ni rtsed mo la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-13: glu dang sil snyan gyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-14: la la ni gcig tu bde bas; la la ni gcig tu sdug bsngal bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-15: la la ni de gnyis kas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-16: la la ni gnyis ka ma yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-17: sems can la la ni dge sbyong du sprul pas 'dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-18: sems can la la ni dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-21: dge bsnyen mar sprul pas 'dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-22: sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407a-23: de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs byed par shes nas @407b sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su shes pa la brtson par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-2: nam byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa las nges par byung bar gyur cing byang chub gyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsdus par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-3: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-4: de nas gdod sems can yongs su smin par byed nus pa'i skal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-10: yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-11: bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-12: dus dang dus ma yin par bskul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-13: bsam pa yongs su shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-15: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-16: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-18: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:407b-23: bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-3: khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-4: snying rje chen po'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-5: phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-6: bdag shin tu dul ba'i sems te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-13: g-yo med cing sgyu dang bral ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-15: nyes par byas pa bzod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-17: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so; ;rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-19: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-21: bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408a-22: bskal pa dga' byed la 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-0: bde bar gshegs @408b pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-1: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba de'ang 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-6: nyams dga' ba lha dang mis rab tu gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang ba de'i nyan thos kyang nyan thos chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'dus par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-9: de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-13: de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-14: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-16: btsas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-18: longs spyod dang skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:408b-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de @409a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-2: ma la rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-4: de gzugs dang longs spyod dang skyid pas rgyags dregs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-5: nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du yang mi 'ong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-6: gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bskul na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong yang srid snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-11: khyed kyi nang nas yid yongs su mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba thams cad ni spangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-12: sdug bsngal thams cad ni dang du blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-13: de las tha na kun tu smra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-15: stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-16: gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub po mi snyan par zer yang spro bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing brims so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409a-18: de ltar tshul shing brims kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang spro bar ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-0: bcom ldan 'das des tshul shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyang sus kyang ma @409b blangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-2: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-3: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-6: bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongs su mi skyo bar bde ba thams cad ni spangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-7: sdug bsngal thams cad ni ji mi snyam par bgyis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-8: rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-9: zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-11: lha'i bu brgyad stong gis kyang steng gi bar snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-13: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di ni legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:409b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-2: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos mthong nas gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub po sna tshogs kyang smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-9: lus la reg cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'khrug pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-12: phyir log par ma gyur gyi steng du brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu bskyed nas stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-14: snying rje chen po yang bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-15: de lo stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te smad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-17: brdeg pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi skyo bar de lo khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-18: de lo nyi khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gsum pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-19: lo bdun khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-20: lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang bdun pa'i nang du zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-21: de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-24: khyod la ci dgos smros shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410a-25: ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-0: rgyal bu gzhon nu de dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas ci tsam du dge slong des @410b yongs su mi skyo ba gnags nus pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de sems rab tu dang bar shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-4: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-5: zas dang skom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-6: gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-7: zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-8: bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'dir 'ongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-9: 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-10: mi mchog dri ma med par snang zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-11: de ni sdug bsngal mthar 'byin chos ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-12: sems can gang gis thos pas mi 'chi thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-13: bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs med na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-14: sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-15: de ltar 'jig rten mun gnag sgron gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-16: yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-17: khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa'i yon tan chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-18: gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu myos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-19: skyid myos de bzhin rgyal srid myos pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-20: chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-21: longs spyod mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-22: rtsva rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-23: gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-24: de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi cha ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-25: khyod ni 'di na byang chub mchog zhugs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:410b-26: sems can dag kyang gnyer te 'gro bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-1: bdag de ltar 'dod pa'i bran gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-2: ji ltar mos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-3: nga rgyal spongs te nyon mongs rnams sol la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-4: da ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-5: brtson 'grus bskyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-6: phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-7: rgyal bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-8: nga rgyal spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-9: brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-10: gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-11: bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-12: 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-13: nga rgyal tha ba'i skyon dang dregs spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-14: myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-15: de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad cus bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-16: me tog na bza' spos dang bdug pa thogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-17: dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu'i mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-18: rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-19: bde bar gshegs kyi gan du mchis nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-20: zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-22: rgyal bu des ni tshig ni 'di smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-23: gang phyir skyon med sems kyis bskul bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-24: brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gis ston pa mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-25: ji ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411a-26: de la lan du phan pa bya mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-0: bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod @411b par gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-1: chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-2: de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-3: bdag ni nongs pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-4: sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-5: bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-6: byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-7: slan chad bag med spyod par mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-8: rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-9: sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-10: byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-11: sngon byung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-12: rgyal ba de dag gis ni bsam mkhyen nas; ;byang chub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-13: chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-14: thams cad kyis kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-17: bskal pa las lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-18: gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-20: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-21: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:411b-23: de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba der gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-1: tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-5: de ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-6: 'di ltar shin tu stobs dang ldan te brtson 'grus nye bar ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-8: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed 'dod pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-11: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-13: bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' las yin te; sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-16: bdud kyi las las shin tu 'das pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412a-20: yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub @412b pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-2: bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-7: bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-8: dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-9: nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i ye shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-10: nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-12: bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-15: gang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas kyang rin du mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:412b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-0: bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che @413a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-1: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-3: bdag gi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-4: bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-7: nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-8: kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-15: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-16: de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-17: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-18: zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-19: bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-21: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413a-22: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-0: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs @413b su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-1: mi mnyam mnyam pa'i dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-2: sh'akya'i rgyal sras dbang po zhi zhing dri gsum dri ma spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-3: mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-4: ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-5: gya gyu mi mnga' rab tu gnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-6: skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-7: bde gshegs mos pa'i mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-8: ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-9: stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-10: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur rab grags rgol ba bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-11: thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-12: chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-13: rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dges pa shin tu dri med zhal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-14: zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam me bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-15: mun pa bcom zhing rdul bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-16: bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum mdzad phan par mdzad pas bka' stsol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:413b-17: gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nams ye shes 'phro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-0: mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod pa'i @414a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-1: 'os; ;srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-2: nam mkha'i ngos rab snang bar sh'akya seng ge 'dzum pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-3: lha dang mis mchod khyod 'dra sa dang lha yul dag na'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-4: yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-5: yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-6: bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-7: kun tu khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-8: sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-9: sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-10: mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-11: nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha mang yid kyang rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-12: mi tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-13: gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-14: mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-0: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la @414b phul ba mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-9: ri mor byas shing mchod nas thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong na bskal pa dri ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas; rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-14: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-15: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:414b-18: 'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-0: sems can gang dag 'od des reg par @415a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-2: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-4: der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-5: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming ni rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-7: de dag gi longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-8: kun spyod pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-9: gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-10: mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-11: de na mi khom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-12: ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-13: de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-15: mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415a-21: yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-0: de dag @415b thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-2: de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa ba'am bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-4: pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-5: snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-6: theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-8: zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-9: de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-11: de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-13: tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-14: tshig gcig po de yang gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-17: tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-18: tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-19: tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-21: aa zhes bya ba de ni mi zad pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-22: aa zhes bya ba la zhugs na yig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:415b-23: de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-0: yig 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par @416a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-1: thos par bya mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-2: yi ge 'bru re re nas brjod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-3: yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-4: de bas na tshig gcig pa de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-5: gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-6: rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-7: de ltar tshig de mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-8: rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-10: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-11: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba med de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-14: bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod cing; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan yongs su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416a-17: bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-0: bcom ldan @416b 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-1: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-2: chos rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-3: 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams thams cad las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-5: ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-6: sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-7: bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-8: de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-10: de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-11: bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-12: srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-15: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-16: bdag ni the tshom yongs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-17: sa rnams thams cad 'gags kyang gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-18: nyi zla mkha' las ltung yang gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-19: bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-20: phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-21: ye shes ldan la shes rab che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-22: des ni bdag la bden tshig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-23: byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-24: sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-25: thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-26: bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-27: sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-28: de 'dra nyid du kun bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-29: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-30: the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:416b-31: sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-0: @417a *// mchog gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-1: bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-2: sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-3: de bas shin tu dpag yas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-4: bdag gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-7: zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-8: byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-9: bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-10: sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-11: ji srid 'dren par ma gyur par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-12: de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-13: rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-14: sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-15: byang chub dam pa don du btsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-16: de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-17: byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-18: srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-20: tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417a-21: de thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-0: de nas bcom @417b ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-6: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-9: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-12: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhes zhes sbyin pa byin pa pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-16: klog gam de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-17: 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-18: tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-21: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:417b-25: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-0: @418a *// de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-1: gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang; lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-8: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-10: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-11: 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-12: 'dus pa bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-13: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la sh'i la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-14: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de dharma t'a sh'i las bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-012:418a-15: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa;;
